Description_lang: $?a137032[Power Word: Shield absorbs $s2% additional damage.All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by $s3%.][Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by $s1%.All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by $s4%.]

description_blz.en_US:
Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by 40%.

All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by 40%.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta un 40% la sanación realizada por Rezo de alivio.

Todo el daño infligido por Punición, Fuego sagrado y Nova sagrada aumenta un 40%.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta em 40% a cura realizada por Prece da Recomposição.

Todo o dano causado por Punição, Fogo Sagrado e Nova Sagrada aumentado em 40%.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht die durch 'Gebet der Besserung' hervorgerufene Heilung um 40%.

Der gesamte durch 'Heilige Pein', 'Heiliges Feuer' und 'Heilige Nova' verursachte Schaden wird um 40% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB:
Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by 40%.

All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by 40%.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumenta un 40% la sanación de Rezo de alivio.

Aumenta un 40% todo el daño infligido por Punición, Fuego Sagrado y Nova Sagrada.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente les soins de Prière de guérison de 40 %.

Les dégâts de Châtiment, Flammes sacrées et Nova sacrée sont augmentés de 40 %.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta le cure fornite da Preghiera di Guarigione del 40%.

Aumenta tutti i danni inflitti da Punizione, Fuoco Sacro ed Esplosione Sacra del 40%.
description_blz.ru_RU:
"Молитва восстановления" восполняет на 40% больше здоровья.

Урон от "Кары", "Священного огня" и "Кольца Света" увеличивается на 40%.
description_blz.ko_KR:
회복의 기원의 치유량이 40%만큼 증가합니다.

성스러운 일격, 신성한 불꽃, 신성한 폭발의 모든 공격력이 40%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
癒合禱言造成的治療效果提高40%。

懲擊、神聖之火和神聖新星造成的所有傷害提高40%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
愈合祷言的治疗量提高40%。

惩击、神圣之火和神圣新星造成的所有伤害提高40%。
